headline: Tracking David Tepper's Appaloosa Management Portfolio - Q2 2025 Update
summary: David Tepper's Q2'25 portfolio changes reveal bold bets on Whirlpool and healthcare, trimmed big tech gains, and a bullish stance on tech and healthcare trends. See more.

headline: United Airlines to Present at the Morgan Stanley's 13th Annual Laguna Conference
summary: United will present at Morgan Stanley's 13th Annual Laguna Conference on Thursday, September 11, beginning at 10:45 a.m. PST. On the webcast Mike Leskinen, Chief Financial Officer, will make remarks on current trends affecting our business.
